name: Bear With Me (itch) (Reality Whale)
description:
Bear With Me is a 3D story-based game where you play from the perspective of a young person called Ash controlling their teddy bear as it helps them overcome emotional challenges through a surreal dreamscape.

Specifically, the narrative follows Ash realising, repressing, and coming to terms with their queer identity.

Bear With Me is made by Reality Whale, a group of 3rd year creative computing students (Games Pathway) at Bath spa University. Bear With Me is currently under the final stages of development for its first release.

Key features:

Collecting stuffing to double jump

Small open world 3D environment to explore

Personal and emotional narrative

Controls: 

WASD or arrow keys for basic movement 

Spacebar to jump

Future

Bear With Me is currently only 2 chapters of a planned 5. This next section will look at the concept art and gray boxes for the later chapters.
